verbs.description: For months , President Donald Trump [V: has] claimed he was unaware that his attorney paid $ 130,000 to adult film actress Stephanie Clifford —who performs under the stage name Stormy Daniels— shortly before the 2016 election to prevent Daniels from talking about an alleged sexual encounter with Trump .
